content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern in one printable file without advertisements s/m i used up 2 full cakes of caron cakes and a few more yards to add the scallop edging l/xl 3 cakes of caron cakes yarn 2xl/3xl 3-1/2 skeins of caron cakes yarn the pattern is written in us terminology this poncho is designed using a very simple stitch and caron cakes yarn it includes sizes s to 3 xl
